words.definition: When something is animate, it has life.
words.example: Rocks and machines are not animate things.

words.definition: To classify things is to put them into groups based on their type.
words.example: The biologist classified the plant as a completely new species.

words.definition: To concede is to admit that something is true against your wish.
words.example: The student conceded that he had cheated on the test.

words.definition: A concept is an idea about something.
words.example: I learned some concepts of molecules before working in the science lab.

words.definition: To construct something means to build it.
words.example: They are constructing a new bridge.

words.definition: A decade is a period of ten years.
words.example: The company has grown a lot over the last decade.

words.definition: A diagram is a simple drawing that explains something.
words.example: The teacher drew a diagram of the heart on the board.

words.definition: A ferry is a boat that carries people and cars across a river.
words.example: We took the ferry across the lake.

words.definition: If something is handy, it is useful or easy to use.
words.example: This tool is very handy for fixing things.

words.definition: To isolate something means to keep it separate from other things.
words.example: The patient was isolated to prevent the spread of the virus.

words.definition: A longing is a strong feeling of wanting something.
words.example: He felt a longing for his home.

words.definition: If things are numerous, there are many of them.
words.example: There are numerous stars in the sky.

words.definition: A particle is a very small piece of something.
words.example: Dust particles were floating in the air.

words.definition: A plea is an urgent and emotional request.
words.example: She made a plea for help.

words.definition: To refrain from something means to not do it.
words.example: Please refrain from smoking in this area.

words.definition: A review is a formal assessment of something.
words.example: The committee will conduct a review of the project.

words.definition: If something is sophisticated, it is very advanced or complex.
words.example: The new security system is very sophisticated.

words.definition: To surrender means to stop fighting and admit defeat.
words.example: The army was forced to surrender.

words.definition: If something is upright, it is standing straight up.
words.example: He sat in an upright position.

words.definition: If something is worthwhile, it is important or useful enough to be worth the effort.
words.example: It was a worthwhile experience.
